Authors: Xiang Sun, Liang-Dong Guo, Ji-Guang Wei, Lin Wang
Title:
A new endophytic fungus Neofabraea illicii sp. nov. isolated
from Illicium verum
Keywords:
Neofabraea, Cryptosporiopsis, Illicium, New taxon,
Taxonomy
Abstract:
A new ascomyceteous species Neofabraea illicii was
isolated as an endophytic fungus from economically important plant,
Illicium verum, in a plantation in southern China. N. illicii
morphologically differs from Neofabraea alba, Neofabraea krawtzewii,
Neofabraea malicorticis and Neofabraea perennans with its smaller
ascospore size, and from Neofabraea eucalypti by its 1-septate
ascospore. Phylogenetic analysis of the ITS regions using maximum
parsimony and Bayesian methods indicates that N. illicii is
distinct.
